attributes.action: make it compulsory for food service areas to provide heating facilities for baby food.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a mother I find it absolutly absurd that if you go out with your baby there are not many places that will heat baby food. I herby ask Mr Prime Minister to make it compulsory for food service areas to provide a domestic microwave so that parents/carers can heat baby food. As a mother I find it patronising that food services state that they will not heat baby food due to the risk of scalding, however most places have bottle warmers where the risk of scalding is just as high. Why should babies be deprived of warm food?
